subjectMail.description: subject of mail sent to the person with credentials, you can use variables _firstname_ and _lastname_

bodyMailStart.description: start of the mail body, you can use variables _firstname_ and _lastname_, eg. 'Hello _firstname_ here are your credentials'

bodyMailEnd.description: end of the mail body, eg. 'Greetings'

passwordChars.description: caracters used for password generation, eg. ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ

URL Login.description: The URL used to connect to the service

Service Group.description: The Service Group, used to group services in the interface

Password Notes.description: Password notes shown in inteface and provided in mail body

Icon.description: URL to an icon (it can be any browser valid image format)

User Group.description: User Group that need the service

URL Create Account.description: URL path to create the account page on the service

login.description: jQuery selector for login input field, don't forget to escape double quotes

email.description: jQuery selector for email input field, don't forget to escape double quotes

password.description: jQuery selector for password input field, don't forget to escape double quotes

passwordconfirm.description: jQuery selector for password confirm input field, don't forget to escape double quotes

firstname.description: jQuery selector for firstname input field, don't forget to escape double quotes

lastname.description: jQuery selector for lastname input field, don't forget to escape double quotes

fullname.description: jQuery selector for fullname input field, don't forget to escape double quotes

custom.description: additionnal JavaScript code to be executed, don't forget to escape double quotes
